[bq="Number1pegasus"]"@Too_Offensive":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/556794b56368726402d70200#post_556794b56368726402d70200
...Actually. I think there were Eyeball creatures around.

I had this weird dream that I accidently found out I had mutant powers (I cant remember what they were? I think something dealing with Water or Fire?) 

And there was this Lady that looked A LOT like Satsuki teaching me how to use my powers and became my master.

She could turn into a reptile form and had the power over grass.

Aaand that's about all I remember? Just weird shit all the way around. [/bq]
